name: Modern and Vampire Charsets(Big Battlers Bonus!)
name_original: Modern and Vampire Charsets(Big Battlers Bonus!)
description:
This is a set of modern and vampire charsets made of Pixel Art, containing 10 normal sprites + 10 vampire versions.

- 10 modern chars
- 10 vampire chars
- 2 big battlers vamp-girls
- 1 big battler king of vampires
